name: CopernicusDashboard
description: A simple, modern web application for organizing test tube blood samples within virtual racks. Designed to run locally without external dependencies, storing data in local JSON files via a lightweight Node.js server.

name: ZoneWrangler
description: Supplemental Cisco ASA to FTD migration tool that properly zones ACP and NAT rules.
